players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, as he might be the detective."
You: "Bob, I think Charlie is the detective. He hasn't said anything yet and Diana has already confessed."
